item.description:
Spotlight Theater is the new theatre in Hartford.  It's in a good area of town and parking is very easy - either on street parking (if there's a spot) or in the adjacent parking garage ($2 charge).  The seats in the theater are the most comfortable around and they bar serves excellent drinks (that you can bring into the theater ). 

They are running a midnight movies series that kicked off last week with The Big Lebowski.  I was able to get to it and it was a lot of fun!  Trivia, look-alike contest, prizes and movie-themed drinks.

This is the second in the series and should be an equally good time.   

Saturday Late Night/Classic Film Fest continues on Saturday February 23rd with Pulp Fiction! Samuel Jackson look a like contest. Kahuna Burgers and Justin's special bar milkshakes! Doors open at 10:15pm and film starts at midnight!
item.name: Pulp Fiction - Midnight Showing
